sections.title: Mangalaa Aartee
Shangaar Aartee
Karta Stuti
sections.verses:
Aho Naatha Naaham Jaanaami Jaanaami, Mandam Mam Matiyam Tamo Sad Gatiyam;
Hohu Aapaku Sarvam Pahechaanam Divyanam, Tanu Tatve Taayam Ratiyam Ratiyam…1
Aho Naatha Naatham Nirvaanam Niraalamba, Trikaalam Nihaalam Vikraalam Nayeti;
Saswam Sarva Bhootaanam Sapraanam Satantram, Vitrenam Vrataarnam Kartaaram
Sakheti…2
Aho Naatha Ho Tuma Vidhyaanam Sidhantam, Vittam Sat Nidaanam Samaanam Dhaanaami;
Shravyaanam Mantrenam Kledam Vham Aantrenam, Chaitanam Karanaaram Prenantam
Namaami…3
Aho Naatha Swaadham Sarvagynam Na Vaadam, Anantam Aghaadam Bodhantam Sanaadu;
Vishwatam Vilaasam Sohansam Adhyaasam, Vilantam Vinaasam Sadaa Tum Anaadu…4
Aho Naatha Aaram Punipada Paaram, Nodhaaram Aodhaaram Apaaram Nirantu;
Tatva Swam Samaasam Akhandam Anaasam, Samrutam Salolam Utpanna Tam Karantu…5
Aho Naatha Kshaatam Nara Paksham Ajaatam, Vividham Tam Vibhaasam Ekoham Adhyaapi;
Aarandham Urandham Madhyaanam Mahanatam, Athaaham Athaaham Athaaham Amaapi…6
Aho Naatha Swaamee Manu Tana Dharaami, Akaamam Sakaamee Jeevam Parama Arthu;
Bhaye Bhekha Dhaaram Sashaanti Sakaaram, Harantam Vikaaram Hakaaram Samarthu…7
Aho Naatha Aanee Kaivalam Nishaanee, Sohu Ham Jaanee Aapo Aapa Aapam;
Atantam Aakrantam Prakaasham Pravenam, Naravedam Vigynaanam Vade Laksha
Vyaapam…8
Aho Naatha Ho Hama Sharanam Tumaaram, Rakho Nita Nityam Sadaayam Sadhaamee;
Agunam Anekam Ahanm Twam Sahekam, Krupaalam Dayaalam Kuveram Akaamee…9
Aho Jakt Naatham Sarvam Maata Taatam, Anaatham Ke Naatham Sahejaananda Sabhaavu;
Akhilam Samaanam Drashtiyam Dharantam, Karunaayam Kuveram Kadhinam Kabhaavu…10

sections.title: Saakhee
sections.verses:
Bhakti Gyaan Vairaaga Ke, Sakala Shaastra Fala Tera;
Sahu Sampati Sukha Paaeeye, Bhetata Shreemat Kuver…1
Chidaananda Chakave Pati, Gati Karana Mana Swanhtya;
Aayehu Juga Darshaavavaa, Ghata Ghata Kaival Kranhtya…2
Roma Roma Raja Raja Gati, Mati Manohara Gyaan;
Divya Desha Vividha Vidha, Karee Gaye Sakal Pahechaana…3
Uchare Grantha Agaada Hee, Kali Mala Harana Agynaan;
Natha Karanaku De Gaye, Sajjanaku Paya Paana…4

sections.title: Pari Kramaa
sections.verses:
Chaalo Santa Sajjana Prakanmaa Prabhunee Karo Jo,
Shreemat Kuver Charana Shisha Preete Dharo Jo…Tek
Kadama Eka Koti Yagyna Fala Paamasho Jo,
Choraashee Laksha Janama Keru Dukha Vaamasho Jo…..Chaalo…1
Chatura Aanhtee Ganhtee Khaana Chaturanee Tale Jo,
Panchamee Prakanmaaye Achala Padavee Male Jo…..Chaalo…2
Kanaka Dandavat Namee Paaye Je Pare Jo,
Sapta Gotra Laee Parama Pada Paravare Jo…..Chaalo…3
Charana Sevaa Sukhanee Shira Saadhana Sau Fale Jo,
Grahee Chinhtaamami Jene Haatha Dhare Te Male Jo.....Chaalo…4
Binunh Chena Charana Chaaho Mata Koeenaa Jo,
Pragata Jakta Guru Sharana Graho Aoyanaa Jo…..Chaalo…5
Sukhanaa Saagara Dukha Nikandana Karanaar Chhe Jo,
Bhaye Darshana Dhanya Teno Avataara Chhe Jo…..Chaalo…6
Khuda Khaavana Khalaka Paavana Karana Aaviyaa Jo,
Akhanda Gyaan Charana Chena Jone Laaveeyaa Jo…..Chaalo…7
Aankusha Amara Kulisha Kamala Javya Shobhitaa Jo,
Dhvajaa Dhenunh Pada Shankha Chakra Opitaa Jo…..Chaalo…8
Swastika Jambu Fala Kalasha Shudhaa Saara Chhe Jo,
Ardha Chandra Khata Kuna Meena Aakaara Chhe Jo…..Chaalo…9
Bindu Uradha Rekhaa Ashta Kuna Aanga Manh Jo,
Indra Dhanush Triye Kuna Dhaaree Tana Manh Jo…..Chaalo…10
Karunaa Sinhdhu Kuver Pragat Jugamanh Hari Jo,
Aanga Ranga Ananga Chhabee Soorata Tahanh Varee Jo…..Chaalo…11
Sole Kala Samapurana Sarva Saaja Chhe Jo,
Narandas Kahe Evaa Mahaaraaja Chhe Jo…..Chaalo…12

sections.title: Guru Stuti
sections.verses:
Prathama Vandu Guru Sat Swaamee,Sakala Guna Gati Saagarama;
Taa Charana Raja Leee Dharunh Shira Para, Dhyo Gati Agama Ujaagarama…1
Tyaaga Bhakti Puni Prema Gyaan Nija, Akhanda Anubhava Deejeeye;
Karee Karunaa Prabhu Deena Jaanee, Jana Aapano Kara Leejeeye…2
Jayeti Jayeti Juga Taata Swaamee, Antaryaamee Aapa Ho;
Upaaye Ansha Ku Daksha Devaa, Gyaan Mevaa Laaye Ho…3
Amruta Fala Nija Moksha Laaye, Paaye Santa Sajaana Bhaye Chhakeettam;
Dusta Jeeva Duramati Ke Ghera, Na Paaye Bhaye Dukheetama…4
Ubhaye Janaku Sukha Saaheka, Suno Santa Sachetanam;
Gyaan Heena Jaga Bhinna Jadavat, Shtaavara Sama Manu Vetanam…5
Umang Nhee Nabha Ghana Na Garajata, Varasata Nahee Binunh Projanam;
Sinhchata Baaga Jaba Shira Niyantaa, Kaaja Akaaja Saba Prokshanama…6
Upaja Samee Fala Beeja Vaadee, Binunh Fala Vruksha Akhandanam;
Laabha Linna Bhinna Vrutti Naayaka, Sinhchata Nahee Taru Vrundanam…7
Vishwa Baaga Kartaa Vrutti Preraka, Sinhchata Ghana Sukha Daayakam;
Gyaan Jadeepa Jagatye Saba Jaave, Manu Shreshta Na Saraayakam…8
Sthaavara Jangama Sama Srushti, Pushti Karana Preechhyunh Te Nahee;
Binunh Pushti Parale Saba Jaave, Feree Rachatanh Prehetana Sahee…9
Nija Pati Eeta Hera Aagynaa Dei, Aapa Ansha Pathaavanam;
Binunh Nija Gyaan Jagata Jana Parale, Sarala Gela Nahee Paavanam…10
Dayaavanta Ananta Gati Jeenunh, Gavana Santa Sanga Shobhitama;
Gagana Udaghana Chandra Sobhe, Ananga Chhabee Soorata Jana Lobheetama…11
Kalaa Khata Dasha Nidhya Poorana, Sidhdhi Ashta Charane Vase;
Deva Chatura Dasha Sevaa Kaarana, Laaye Aapa Sura Dhaamase…12
Adhara Takhata Para Arasha Aasana, Darashata Hee Divya Netaram;
Lakshaateeta Paksha Te Varajeeta, Sohi Sat Guru Tataparam…13
Avanya Aankura Beeja Jetaa, Sadaa Sama Vinunh Jala Rahe;
Arasha Neera Jaba Parasa Paaye, Ude Aankura Sanmukha Rahe…14
Saghana Ghana Neera Sudhdha Karunaa, Shreemat Kuver Kee Jaba Thaee;
Ansha Aankura Udaye Achala Mati, Nija Pati Sanmukha Drashta Bhaee…15
Teja Poonhja Tanu Vishesha Vibhooti, Shakti Jyota Nahee Paavanam;
Aja Umiyaa Pati Shree Pati Shaarada, Shesha Sahastra Mukha Gaavanam…16
Santa Sahaaya Karana Nija Karta, Bhakta Vastala Nara Tanu Dhare;
Shreemat Kuver Saba Shukha Ke Daataa, Daasa Hetu Dolanta Fire…17
Firata Bhava Bhira Bhanjana Prabhu, Karana Kaaja Saba Jeevanam;
Asankhya Jeeva Dhanee Dhaama Pathaavata, Bandee Chhoda Vrada Vandanam…18
Tilaka Bhaala Vishaala Lochanam, Adhura Anopama Shobhitam;
Nijaananda Ghanashyaama Moorata, Santa Janake Mana Lobheetam…19
Paanya Jodee Shira Naaee Sevaka, Daasa Narana Kare Vinanti;
Maagu Prema Bhakti Charana Sevaa, Yasha Gaavaa Anubhava Gati…20

sections.title: Guru Mahima
sections.verses:
Pratham Paramguru Ne Namu, Deeye Karta Sanbandhee Gnyan;
Aapanapu Pati Jan Ke, Taje Jakta Abhiman…1
Jag Bandhan Ati Jan Ku, Tan Man Keeye Behal;
Maha Vikat Kali Kalmau, Pragate Deen Dayal…2
Anant Bhramaudaki Vibhuvit, Pragat Chin Sanyukta;
Dhanya Paramguru Pomee Para, Ansha Karana Ku Mukta…3
Pati Pada Paramguru Eka Meka, Samaje Je Santa E Moto Viveka…4
Akala Kalaa Na Kale Koee Janta, Evee Gati Paramguru Nee Ananta…5
Ananta Brahmandaa Dheesha Kahaave, Teno Laksha Paramguru Yanh Hanh Laave…6
Sarvateeta Sarvesvar Swamee, Teno Laksh Devaane Koka Kadaamee…7
Nigama Nayeti Kahe Niradhaara, Saamaanya Jeeva Na Jaane Sansaara…8
Rachyo Jene Jakta Sakala Pasaara, Joye Jama Tama Deta Tanh Hanh Aahaara…9
Evaa Sukha Daayaka Laayaka Swamee, Tene Na Bhajaave Bharee Koee Haamee…10
Himmata Vinaa Jo Haamee Bharee Je, Sharane Aave Tene Te Shunh Pada Deeje…11
Evaa Guru Thaga Thage Sahu Loka, Patipada Saachunh Lahyaa Vinaa Foka…12
Pati Pada Paramguru Eka Jaane, Bhavelanh Padaaratha Sahu Vakhaane…13
Bhavelanh Ne Je Koee Kahe Bhagavanta, Evaa Guru Baadala Santa Ananta…14
Paramguru Nija Pati Naa Vettaa, Bhoolaayaa Jeeva Kiyaa Te Sachetaa…15
Pati Pada Darshaave Divya Nenhna, Dekhaade Sarve Anshonu Yena…16
Kare Ansha Potaane Ghera Nivaasa, Evo Guru Gyaan Gatino Prakaasha…17
Evaa Gatiyaara Guru Ne Je Poonhje, Tenaa Ghata Manh Hee Gati Bahu Suje…18
Anubhavanand Aananda No Kanda, Sanshe Garbha Sankata Taare Fanda...19
Guru Humaahu Chhaayaa Krupaa Pasaare, Karta Sharane Sukha De Dukha Nivaare…20
Evaa Guru Jaane Karyo Vishwaas, Motaa Muni Charana Kare Chhe Nivaasa…21
Aja Bhava Shree Pati Sura Sameta, Lahe Sukha Sanakaadik Thaee Veta…22
Shankar Datta Kapil Hee Vyaas, Mahimaa Kare Narada Guru Prakaasha…23
Shaarada Shesha Vakhaane Veda, Guru Vachanaaratha No Ati Bheda…24
Maane Jaga Eesha Dashu Avataara, Rahe Nija Guru Tane Aadhaara…25
Paamyaa Eeshataa Guru Krupaa Jo Paaee, Binnu Krupaa Jaga Jeeva Saraaee…26
Guru Saamratha Sabe Sukha Daataa, Aave Sharane Tene Kare Gati Maataa…27
Peeve Rasa Poorana Ansha Chhaketu, Rahe Hajoori Ansha Thaee Badavetu…28
Pokhe Vitta Paramguru Heta Aanee, Milaave Pati Pada De Niravaanee…29
Guru Pada Praudha Prachanda Pratyaksha, Paame Nija Kaival Moksha Ke Daksha…30
Gati Chakave Anubhava Anaadu, Laghu Jeeva Ko Jaane Vaada Vivaadu…31
Guru Pada Motu Amogha Amoolya, Aave Nahee Koee Guru Sama Tulya…32
Vaishnav Koti Ananta Aneka, Tene Shira Shobhe Guru Pada Eka…33
Guru Guru Jyanh Tyanh Sau Koee Kahe Chhe, Chaara Prakaare Guru Pada Rahe Chhe…34
Proksha Guru Pada Proksha Bataave, Padaaratha Manh Jeeva Ku Vilamaave…35
Guru Pada Deva Bataave Pratyaksha, Darshaavee Deha Manh Aape Tehee Daksha…36
Sat Guru Sat Bataave Je Ansha, Narne Karee Juve Karta Ko Vansha…37
Tehee Ansha Aapanapu Taba Jaane, Jabee Sat Guru Tehee Paramaane…38
Jeno Ansha Tyanh Hee Melaapa Karaave, Anshi Pada Manh Ekataa Karavaave…39
Anshi Pad Kaival Eka Samevaa, Aaye Teno Laksha Paramguru Devaa…40
Paramguru Param Pati Ke Pyaaraa, Mile Garbha Sankata Thee Kare Nyaaraa…41
Evaa Guru Aananda Mahaa Sukha Kaaree, Para Upakaara Karana Deha Dhaaree…42
Divya Roopa Sundeera Sobhaa Rasaala, Ghanashyam Moorata Mahaa Vishaala…43
Pada Pankaja Alee Ansha Shobhe, Letanh Mukaranda Mano Jaee Thobhe…44
Asankhya Ansha Kare Jyanh Nivaas, Sharane Aave Je Teno Thaaya Samaasa…45
Faree Garbha Sankata Te Nava Paame, Saache Dale Aave Mahaa Dukha Vaame…46
Evo Pada Pankaja No Parataapa, Mile Pati Pad Lahe Nija Aapa…47
Evaa Sukha Manh Jana Jheele Apaarunh, Aho Dhanya Jana Je Paame Dedaarunh…48
Evaa Jana Bhaayaga Vaana Bhavetu, Bhaye Bhava Manh Jehee Bhakti Ke Khetu…49
Guru Ghana Gyaan Sinhche Jala Dhaaraa, Paake Prabhutaa Vidhi Gati Apaaraa…50
Tehee Prabhutaa Pada Praudha Te Padamee, Karta Kaara Thaee Lahe Sukha Kadamee…51
Tehee Sukhanaa Je Daataa Guru Pote, Tale Je Asoojha Guru Mukha Jote…52
Aruna Ude Aandha Ku Nava Soojhe, Binunh Ansha Bhakti Pati Nava Boojhe…53
Bhajaave Guru Te Pati Pada Vaache, Levaa Tehee Laksha Rahyo Mana Saache…54
Saacho Sambandha Sadaa Sukha Kaaree, Tana Mana Dhana Guru Para Vaaree…55
Mithyaa Pada Detanh Mahaa Pada Paave, Thaee Sharane Rahe Bhakti Ke Daave…56
Guru Tuma Vinaa Nahee Koee Maaru, Laagyu Kaala Maayaa Tanu Bahu Laaru…57
Tethee Dukha Paamyo Aghaada Apaaru, Ko Na Kare Sahaaya Nahee Koya Maaru…58
Kaama Krodha Lobha Mahaa Bada Bhoopa, Inhdri Guna Antasa Shatru Janoopa…59
Ehee Saba Shatru Vedhe Tana Maarun, Kare Chhe Behaala Nahee Sukha Saarun…60
Traahe Traahe Pokaarunh Chhu Pati Ku, Suno Dhanee Araja E Dukha Sati Ku…61
Hoya Pativrataa To Pati Ne Laaja, Vitandee Ne Sukha Na Male Samaaja…62
Evaa Guru Charana Tano Je Upaasee, Sukhe Pad Pame Karta Avinashi…63
Guru Te Kartaa Manh Nahee Bhinna Bhaava, Nishche Nija Jana Tano Ehee Daava…64
Preete Peeve Paava Guru Naa Pakhaalee, Tenunh Hrudaya Sudhdha Thaaya Ajavaalee…65
Teeratha Aneka Tanunh Fala Aave, Prasaadee Preete Karee Ne Je Paave…66
Poonje Preeta Karee Gurujee Naa Paaya, Chatura Dasha Deva Poonhjaa Fala Thaaya…67
Guru Sevaa Maanasee Sudhdha Karee Je, Vidhi Sanyukta Hee Dhyaana Dharee Je…68
Jeno Sudhdha Guru Vishe Chhe Bhaava, Tene Shira Jama Tano Nahee Daava…69
Yathaa Yukta Sooje Kare Guru Sevaa, Kartaa Sharane Jaee Lahe Sukha Mevaa…70
Bhajana Kare Guru Nunh Chitta Laaee, Ichchhaa Mana Vanhchhita Te Fala Paaee…71
Vachana Guru Ko Kabu Nava Lope, Teno Mahimaa Jaga Manh Bahu Aope…72
Virodhee Vachana Bole Guru Aage, Anaahuta Paapa Aavee Saba Paage…73
Lope Murajaada Guru Nee Je Shisha, Tene Shira Swaamee Nahee Ana Eesha…74
Ene Koee Dukha De Mahaa Bhaaree, Chhodaave Tene Kona Dayaa Dala Dhaaree…75
Kare Guru Ninhdaa Soone Dee Kaana, Neecha Padavee Paaya De Na Koee Maana…76
Guru Sangathee Vichhade Jana Jeha, Gaye Dharaabola Aave Nahee Chheha…77
Fare Nagharo Bhookampe Krapa Dhaaree, Lage Bhaara Shesha Sahana Apaaree…78
Tenun Mukha Deethe Lage Bahu Dosha, Hari Guru Santa Kare Tinunh Rosha…79
Mahaa Krapa Karee Deve Jama Traasa, Chhodaave Tene Kona Thaaya Niraasha…80
Tenee Saakhya Sanmata Juvo Puraane, Poochho Sat Shaastra Nigama Naraane…81
Vade Vasudhaa Manh Bhaye Jana Jetaa, Guru Vinaa Moksha Nahee Kahe Vettaa…82
Tana Mana Dhana Je Shisha Samarape, Potaa Tarafa Raakhe Na Sau Sukha Arpe…83
Evo Adhikaara Dhare Jana Jehee, Paame Pada Kaival Moksha Sadehee…84
Evaa Prataapee Je Guru Gativantaa, Tene Tajee Jiva Lahe Nahee Antaa…85
Paamyo Manushaa Deha Monhgho Mahaa Amulya, Kuna Kumatya Aavee Tuja Bhoolya...86
Faree Daava Aavo Kabu Nahee Aave, Chuke Guru Thee Jamapura Hee Jaave…87
Jaee Jamapura Kare Tyanh Vaasa, Sahe Mahaa Sankat Garbha Nivaasa…88
Kahunh Ketalee Tuja Moorakha Praanee, Jaane Sharane Guru Shu Heta Aanee…89
Tana Mana Dhana Samarapee Ne Rahevunh, Guru Kasotee De Te Serva Sahevunh…90
Sahee Kasotee Sukha Paamyaa Apaarunh, Aho Jana Dhanya Evaa Adhikaarunh…91
Teno Yasha Jyanh Tyanh Sau Koee Gaashe, Jene Hrudaye Guru Kare Jo Prakaashe…92
Guru Sevaa Manh Chuke Chuka Padaave, Tene Thora Thekaane Kona Tharaave…93
Bhame Bhava Manh Bhamato Bhoora Bhaave, Sukha Nahee Paame Khape Kaala Daave…94
Jene Maathe Kaala Tano Bhaya Bhaaree, Tene Guru Bhakti Lage Nahee Pyaaree…95
Ene Guru Kema Kare Pratipaala, Dayaalu Ghanaa Pana De Mukha Kaala…96
Guru Paase Bese Nahee Sthira Thaaee, Vruti Vilame Jyanh Anaahuta Paaee…97
Anaratha Artha Kamaayo Kutila, Khoyo Manushaa Deha Monhgho Mahaa Susheela…98
Saakuta Ku Ketalee Kahunh Shikshaa, Gayo Adhogata Bina Guru Deekshaa…99
Tadapi Guru Mahaa Parama Dayaalu, Lei Sharane Sukha Deve Rasaalu…100
Evaa Dayaalu Guru Naa Guna Gaatanh, Rahee Jaga Manh Lahe Je Sukha Maatanh…101
Ridhdhi Sidhdhi Sukha Sampata Na Maagunh, Ichchhaa Pada Raja Charana Chita
Laagunh…102
Maagunh Shubha Sevaa Bhakti Pada Saachu, Evo Adhikaara Aave Evunh Jaachu…103
Deena Bandhu Bandee Chhod Kahaavo, Moee Gareeba Lage Tab Daavo…104
Evaa Guru Jaanee Aavyo Chhunh Sharana, Mito Mahaa Dukha Janma Ne Marana…105
Moee Shira Shatru Aneka Bhadehe, Vedhe Tana Je Kaama Baana Gadehe…106
Temanh Chena Kema Pade Dukha Bhaaree, Swaamee Sharane Lyao Grahee Banhya
Mari…107
Tuma Saamratha Haro Dukha Maarunh, Daataa Deena Bandhu E Brada Tamaarunh…108
Chhaayaa Kalpa Vrukshameje Nara Aave, Ichchhaa Mana Vanchhita Te Fala Paave…109
Paarasa Parsha Rahe Loha Jaatee, Kahe Kona Paarasa Naama Vijaatee…110
Dohee Kaama Durgaa Bhukha Nava Bhaagee, Laje Naama Kaama Kare Pada Paagee…111
Chinhtaamani Grahee Ichchhaa Fala Aape, Rahe Na Daaridra Dukha Sarve Kaape…112
Ethee Adhika Paramguru Aape, Malyaa Jene Tene Na Dukha Adhyaape…113
Paame Dukha Daasa Bato Bahu Bese, Grahee Banhya Brada Paalo Guru Yese…114
Josho Aparaadha Maaraa Mana Dhaaree, Chhutu Na Kabu Karma Dosha Apaaree…115
Khunee Khunaka Gunaa Detanh Na Paara, Karo Baksheesha Guru Sharana Tumaara…116
Laje Sharano Jo Ugaaro Na Moee, Apatya Anina Daasa Guru Toee…117
Karu Shu Stuti Munhgo Mukha Vaache, Aaee Guru Sharana Padyo Dala Saache…118
Dekhunna Tuma Sama Aura Na Koee, Naava Vaayas Vrutti Mama Joee…119
Thora Tharana Avara Na Aasha, Jaavunh Jyanh Tyanh Bandhana Ke Paasa…120
Paasha Chhodaavo Saamratha Swaamee, Shreemat Kuver Guru Ku Namaami…121
Namaami Jagata Guru Jaga Eesha, Lahe Mahimaa Tenaa Guru Dheesha…122
Shreemat Kuver Guru Chakravarti, Gyaan Amala Juve Koee Narti…123
Amala Moto Je Paame Adhikaaree, Tenee Prabhutaa Saba Ku Laage Pyaari…124
Guru Shirchhatra Biraaje Jene, Dame Kema Kaala Maayaa Jaga Tene…125
Peede Na Pitru Yaksha Daanava Deva, Saacho Paramguru Saathe Ahanmeva…126
Raajaa Ranka Bhoota Pishaacha Sameta, Nava Graha Aadhya Panoti Saheta…127
Guru Reejha Manh Sukha Sampata Sarva, Vimukhee Virodhee Paame Tare Garva…128
Jenunh Mada Sudana Naama Kahaave, Chadhyo Mada Eku Na Guru Rahaave…129
Guru Saamratha Shreemat Kuver, Narandas Lahyo E Navera…130
Joyunh Narne Karee Aa Juga Manhhee, Guru Bina Sat Padaaratha Nahhee…131
Evunh Satya Jaane Maane Sukha Maatu, Game Na Tene Vishayaa Nanda Naatu…132
Saacho Sambandha Guru Sudhdha Jode, Kare Jaga Aadya Tenu Mana Mode…133
Evo Shooraveera Dage Kem Dekhi, Shreemat Kuver Sharana Leeyo Pekhee…134
Dare Kema Kesharee Baala Karaala, Bhage Jutha Kunhjara Mahaa Vikaraala…135
Pokhe Parataapa Guru Jehee Vitta, Rahe Nagharo Jaga Manh Niravitta…136
Dhare Shanagaara Kanyaa Je Kunhvaaree, Shobhaa Sukha Nahee Binu Bharathaaree…137
Kiyaa Ude Ansha Pati Tehee Jaano, Mile Tehee Laksha Guru Paramaano…138
Guru Te Karta Manh Nahee Fera Faaree, Shreemat Kuver Kee Jyaunh Balihaaree…139
Narandas Charana Chitta Laagunh, Ichchhaa Pada Raja Bhakti Pada Maagun…140

sections.title: Guru Mahima Saakhee
sections.verses:
Mahera Karee Moee Deejeeye, Seva Samarana Dhyaana;
Yasha Gaavaa Anubhava Gati, Karu Pati Parama Avilaana…141
Paramguru Ke Sharana Kee, Mahimaa Aparampaara;
Shaarada Shesha Na Kahee Shake, Ke So Rahe Eetabaara…142
Vaara Paara Jaako Nahee, Guna Gati Dadhi Sama Tola;
Chidiyaa Chancha Bharee Rahee, Saagara Sama Tuma Chhola…143
Dadhi Sama Tuma Guru Gati, Mama Mati Alpa Ajaana;
Mahaa Patita Ku Paavana Karo, Shree Guru Parama Sajaana…144
Sajaana Sharana Aavee Padyo, Narandas Ati Deena;
Praudha Paramguru Jaana Ke, Grahee Sarana Rahyo Loleena…145
Akhilaananda Sukha Sharana Ke, Maane Tehee Santa Sajjana;
Narandas Sharananhgat, Rahyo Dradha Dei Tana Mana…146
Guru Mahimaa Mukhase Padhe, Praatah Same Kare Paatha;
Ananta Janama Agha Sansaya Ku, Sabako Ghaale Ghaata…147
Manana Kare Madhyaanase, Artha Vichaare Jeha;
Tinaku Kaival Moksha Ko, Yaame Nahee Sandeha…148
Sandhyaa Samaye Ehee Paatha Ko, Soone Soonaave Je Artha;
Upaasee Hoya Guru Tano, Paame Anubhava Gratha…149
Ashta Sidhdhi Nava Nidhi Sabe, Sukha Sampata Saba Saaja;
Guru Upaasaname Sabe, Paame Anubhava Raaja…150
Tehee Daataa Guru Parama Hee, Shreemat Kuver Sat Naama;
Narandas Nirabhaya Bhayo, Karee Charana Vishraama…151

sections.title: Jay-Vidhi
sections.verses:
Aadhya SakratA Svaraaj Karunesh Kaival Kartaa Kee Jay
Shree KrishnaSvaami Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Paramguru Shreemat Karunaasaagar Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Dvitiya Kuveraachaaraya Shree Narandaasji Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Trutiya Kuveraachaaraya Shree Baldevdaasji Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Chaturth Kuveraachaaraya Shree Bhagavandaasji Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Pancham Kuveraachaaraya Shree Prayagdaasji Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Shastam Kuveraachaaraya Shree Shitaldaasji Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Saptam Kuveraachaaraya Shree Avichaldasji Mahaaraaj Kee Jay
Shree Saba Santana Kee Jay
Shree Saba Devana Kee Jay
Shree Gyaan Sampradaaya Kee Jay
Shree Gurugaadi Sarsaapuri Kee Jay
Shree Kaival Dhaam Kee Jay
